the White House and Congress. On Dec. 10, Bernie Sanders , an independent, took the floor of the Senate and didn't relinquish it for 8 1/2 hours. His words are being assembled into a book entitled The Speech: A Historic Filibuster on Corporate Greed and the Decline of Our Middle Class. The book's publisher, Nation Books, says millions followed the speech online, crashing the Senate server. A print book is due out next month. An electronic book will be published Jan. 28. rel="nofollow"

. Energy company E.ON was granted permission to build the 77-turbine Humber Gateway wind farm, which will be sited around five miles off the Holderness coast. Chris Huhne , Energy and Climate Change Secretary, said: Offshore wind not only provides clean, green, secure energy, the investment that comes with it is great for the UK economy too.`` A new wind farm off the Humberside coast will be a further jobs and investment boost for the region, hot on the heels of Siemens' announcement of plans to develop the Port of Hull. The wind farm is the first offshore scheme to be given consent since December 2008. Copyright( c) Press Association Ltd. 2011, All Rights Reserved.
